1.0 INTRODUCTION
This is a training proposal by the Mining Engineering Department of the University of Mines and Technology (UMaT), Tarkwa, to deliver training services on Advanced Professional Certificate in Mining for staff of Mining and Allied Institution in Ghana and beyond.

UMaT was established by an Act of Parliament, 2004 (Act 677) with the core mandate of providing higher education through teaching, active research and extension services to the mining and allied industries.
